diff_hunk:

$ git checkout r1.0
Next, you must prepare your environment for -[Linux](#PrepareLinux) +[Linux](#prepare_environment_for_linux) or -[macOS](#PrepareMac) +[macOS](#prepare_environment_for_macos)
body:
Oh I didn't notice the link name here. But actually it not works as you can see above links even it has set this link name. 

I mean https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources#PrepareLinux cannot direct to the correct anchor section but https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources#prepare_environment_for_linux can.

I can remove this link name "PrepareLinux" line or keep this but fix in "PrepareLinux" way. Is there any preference for you? If either would be ok, I'll remove this "PrepareLinux" line.
